entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Chain of Evidence
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

In-App Purchases

  • K√º√ß√ºk Altƒ±n √áantasƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫9,99
  • B√ºy√ºk Altƒ±n Sandƒ±ƒüƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫69,99
  • Orta Altƒ±n Sandƒ±ƒüƒ±Ôºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Mega Altƒ±n HazinesiÔºö‚Ç∫199,99

Application Description

Truths don't stay in the dark... In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case. Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system: Cross-examine witnesses, Gather information by scouring archives, Find traces with specialized tools, Expose suspects' inconsistent statements! Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadƒ±k√∂y, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • The DancerÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The GhoulÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The PriestÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The ExileÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FILCA - SLR Film Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • FUJI SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • KODAK SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • WEDDING SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • RETRO SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • IU SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • LOMO SERIESÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • UPGRADE PRO VERSIONÔºö‚Ç∫3.499,99

Application Description

Filca is SLR Film Camera 35 film filters and cinematic effects bring your photos to life. @veteranUser "Without Filca, you're just collecting moments with Filca, you're preserving memories." Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls. ‚ñ† Shutter speed, ISO, white balance control in Manual mode ‚ñ† 35mm film filters from industry leaders like Kodak, Fuji, Agfa Filca is designed to optimize your snapshot experience. It's perfect for taking photos of people, self-portraits, night scenes, and capturing the subtle beauty of everyday life. Apply our filters to achieve an authentic analog film appearance. Main Features: * Auto mode camera with 35mm film filter * Manual mode (Exposure and Focus) * Full control over shutter speed, ISO * Various aspect ratios: 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1 * Digital zoom up to 8x magnification * Manual Focus Control (macro, landscape) * 35mm film filter from Fuji, Kodak, Agfa (including black and white filter) * Film Grain Effect * Film Date Printing Effect * Optical Image Stabilization * Low Power Mode * Selfie Mode * EXIF Data Storage (including location data) * Portrait Enhancements * Full Resolution Photo * Timer and Flash Function * Grid Mode View Pro Features: * White Balance Adjustment Function * Date Print Function Share your photos on Instagram using #filca We look forward to featuring your work. Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ Terms of Use: https://han.gl/HCCwV Privacy Policy: https://han.gl/Wclkw Let us elevate your photography journey with Filca.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Lara Croft: Guardian of Light
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫289,00 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫289,00]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫289,00

Application Description

READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported. TWO LEVELS FREE Play the first two levels of Lara‚Äôs Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase. === Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night. DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics. BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges. SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online. PICK UP AND PLAY ‚Äî AGAIN AND AGAIN! Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level. TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad. === We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: ‚Ä¢ iPhone XR and later ‚Ä¢ iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later Supported iPads: ‚Ä¢ iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later ‚Ä¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT ¬© 2010, 2025 Crystal Dynamics group of companies. All rights reserved. LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, LARA CROFT, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, and the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Crystal Dynamics group of companies. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dragon Hunt: Tribe Within
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Explore mysterious maps, track the dragons! Complete quests, gather resources, upgrade hunter skills. Unlock secrets, defeat fierce foes, become the ultimate dragon hunter!

Application Description

Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming. Redefining Card Games - Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love - Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments - Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints A World Shrouded in Mystery - Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris - Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices - Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions Complete Gaming Experience - Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions! - Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content - Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics Endless Replayability - Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles - Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges - Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels Join the Dawncaster Community - Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server - Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future - Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey! Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement‚Äîone small victory after another. Bother Bin isn‚Äôt a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn‚Äôt to ‚Äúcheck off‚Äù items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn‚Äôt solve the problem, it‚Äôs worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you‚Äôre always moving forward. Why People Love It ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt live without it anymore! I‚Äôve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the best app I‚Äôve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!‚Äù ‚ÄúWhenever I can‚Äôt sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.‚Äù ‚ÄúSeeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.‚Äù Key Features ‚Ä¢ One-Tap Brain Dump ‚Äì Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals. ‚Ä¢ Time-Stamped Progress Log ‚Äì Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline. ‚Ä¢ Smart Status Chips ‚Äì Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused. ‚Ä¢ 100 % Offline Storage ‚Äì Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required. ‚Ä¢ Light & Dark Modes ‚Äì Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme. Perfect For ‚Ä¢ Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief. ‚Ä¢ ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas. ‚Ä¢ Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking. ‚Ä¢ Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution. ‚Ä¢ Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps. ‚Ä¢ Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb. Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what‚Äôs possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.
